name: Drumpf: Rise Up, Libertonia!
description: At the height of his power, God-Emperor Drumpf was violently dethroned by The Usurpers: dictators who helped overthrow the rightful rulers of the world. Can you rescue and re-unite the rightful rulers of Amerika?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU Storage: 300 MB available space
